(negative prefix)/not/no
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to not know what sb is driving at/to be unintelligible
to not fully understand (idiom)
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
lit. a donkey's lips do not match a horse's mouth (idiom)/fig. beside the point/incongruous
